name: imstat
author: AFNI Developers
description: Calculation of statistics of one or more images

inputs.description: Don't write labels on each file's summary line
inputs.name: No Label Flag

inputs.description: Don't print statistics for each file
inputs.name: Quiet Flag

inputs.description: If more than one image file is given, then 'prefix.mean' and 'prefix.sdev' will be written as the pixel-wise statistics images of the whole collection. These images will be in the 'flim' floating point format. [This option only works on 2D images!]
inputs.name: Pixel-wise Statistics Prefix

output-files.description: Mean of pixel-wise statistics for the collection of 2D images
output-files.name: Mean Output File

output-files.description: Standard deviation of pixel-wise statistics for the collection of 2D images
output-files.name: Standard Deviation Output File
